definition: involving only main features, work clothing consisting of denim trousers usually with a bib and shoulder straps
details:
adjective
- involving only main features
= example: involving only main features
- including everything
= example: including everything
noun
- work clothing consisting of denim trousers usually with a bib and shoulder straps
= example: work clothing consisting of denim trousers usually with a bib and shoulder straps
- a loose protective coverall or smock worn over ordinary clothing for dirty work
= synonyms: boilersuit, boilers suit
